results.title: The Golden ring
results.creator_credit: Humphrey Burton, BBC-TV and Osterreichischer Rundfunk-Fernsehen
results.brief_description: An impression of the enormous musical and technical resources which went into the recording of “Gotterdammerung”, the latest chapter in an ambitious project to record Wagner’s entire Ring Cycle. With actual takes of the Immolation scene, Siegfried’s Funeral March and the ‘Vengeance’ trio which ends Act II, and behind the scenes film of rehearsals, playbacks, recordings, and interviews with some of the principal artists. Singers include Birgit Nilsson, Wolfgang Windgasson, Gottlob Frick, Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau, Clare Watson. Conductor - Georg Solti.

results.title: Golden queen
results.creator_credit: Zain Hussain and Malayan Film Unit
results.brief_description: The pineapple industry in Malaya; harvesting, canning and selling the crop; the organisation of the industry; clearing land for new plantations, planting and caring for the plants; life on the plantation village.

results.title: Golden Bay
results.creator_credit: Cecil Holmes, Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
results.brief_description: A social study of the occupations, leisure activities, community life and local government of the people of Takaka (South Island, New Zealand) and its surrounding district, Golden Bay. Farming is the main business of the people but the area is linked historically with Abel Tasman’s discovery of New Zealand.

results.title: The Golden age of Flemish art
results.creator_credit: Paul Haesaerts, Jean Van Raemdonck and Art et Cinema
results.brief_description: The Golden age of Flemish art explores the meanings, beauties and quaint anecdotal material hidden in the incredibly detailed paintings of Flemish “primitives”. The film displays and comments upon works by Jan Van Eyck, Roger van der Weyden, Dirk Bouts, Hans Memling, Hugo van der Goes, Hieronymus Bosch, Pieter Bruegel, and Quentin Metsus.

results.title: Goldtown
results.creator_credit: R. Maslyn Williams and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The story of Australia’s fabulous town with the “golden mile” - Kalgoorlie in Western Australia, a goldmining town in the midst of a forbidding desert where the water supply is piped hundreds of miles overland.

results.title: Gold on blue
results.creator_credit: Cecil Holmes, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
results.brief_description: A look at the training and life-styles of the young men who enter “Cresswell”, the Royal Australian Naval College, near Nowra, N.S.W. Shows various aspects of the college from which they will graduate as junior officers.

results.title: Going to school in Australia
results.creator_credit: Kenneth Mott, Austarama Television and Nicholas
results.brief_description: A film designed to instruct immigrants to Australia on the nature of the Australian and especially the Victorian education systems. Two representatives in the field of migrant education are questioned about how parents may proceed to enrol their children at school, the different kinds of schools in the Australian system, their various functions and facilities, adult education and several other facets of the education system. Narrated by Barry McQueen.
